article.text: The dismembered bodies of 49 people have been found in plastic bags on the side of a road just outside the northern Mexico city of Monterrey. The gruesome find included the remains of 43 men and six women. More than 50,000 people have been killed in violence since the Mexican government sent in the army as part of a crackdown on drug gangs six years ago. Copyright © 2012 euronews At least four people have been killed and another twenty or so wounded during clashes in the Lebanese city of Tripoli.
